TopicTitle: I apologize but I couldn't find it... again!

Articles.Content:
Similar to, but not the same as-

I present you my request

It dawned on me that as much as my Exp. had been named, nothing about them will be remembered. So I ask the brain

How do I make a Exp. remembered?

And that's why I'm here.

It doesn't have to be big but apart from that the design is in your hands. I would like you to design an emblem/flag/whatever to stick (maybe) in my signature and on the Thread (not this one (search SESEOR)

I know there are some artists out there but I will pick which one I like so anyone can do it.

It does have to have the name of the Exp. and is a request that it is relevant (eg, features from the exp.(yes you might have to read my thread I know!)

Your time starts...now

The current Exp emblem for design is [Exp. Juno]

One last thing - the brackets no matter what font must be these

[]
